name: Unicorn
description: A majestic celestial creature resembling a horse with a spiraled horn, flowing mane, and exceptional grace, often seen in forests and sacred places.
memorable: Known for its ability to heal allies and its powerful magical spells, the unicorn serves as a guardian and symbol of purity.
goals: To protect the natural world and aid the innocent.
relations: Often allied with good-aligned beings and revered by those seeking purity and grace.
environment: Typically found in forests and sacred places.
strengths: High mobility of 50 ft., innate spellcasting, and strong defensive capabilities, including magic resistance and healing abilities.
weaknesses: Susceptible to certain magical effects that it does not resist.
attacks: Multiattack with hooves and horn, inflicting bludgeoning, piercing, and radiant damage, capable of knocking targets prone.
most_powerful_ability: Healing Touch, allowing it to heal other creatures and remove poisons and diseases.
senses: Passive Perception of 15, allowing it to notice hidden threats effectively.
skills: High Wisdom and Charisma scores enhance its social interactions and effectiveness in wisdom-based checks.
additional_information: RADIATES A GOOD AURA enhancing its role as a protector.
Possesses abilities like 'Woodland Walk' allowing it to navigate through difficult terrain easily.
Can communicate with beasts and plants, enhancing its role as a natural guardian.
Has legendary actions enhancing its tactical presence in combat.
Can teleport, providing versatility in movement and escape.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting with options for healing, protection, and utility spells.
test_queries: majestic healing horse with a horn
graceful horned horse protector of nature
creature known for healing and magic
